description: Single storey side/rear infill extension; roof extension to rear (main) roof slope incorporating a Juliet balcony; roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope; installation of three rooflights to front roof slope; and alteration to existing front elevation windows to increase size of openings
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 75RR/2 Rev ID 0 (Ground Floor Existing), 75RR/3 Rev ID 0 (First Floor Existing), 75RR/4 Rev ID 0 (Loft Floor Existing), 75RR/5 Rev ID 0 (Roof Plan Existing), 75RR/6 Rev ID (Ground Floor Proposal), 75RR/7 Rev ID 0 (First Floor Proposal), 75RR/8 Rev ID 0 (Loft Floor Proposal), 75RR/9 Rev ID 0 (Roof Plan Proposal), 75RR/10 Rev ID 0 (Front Elevation Existing), 75RR/11 Rev ID 0 (Side Elevation Nr. 73 Existing), 75RR/12 Rev ID 0 (Side Elevation Nr. 77 Existing), 75RR/13 Rev ID 0 (Back Elevation Existing), 75RR/14 Rev ID 0 (Front Elevation Proposal), 75RR/15 Rev ID 0 (Side Elevation Nr. 73 Proposal), 75RR/16 Rev ID 0 (Side Elevation Nr. 77 Proposal), 75RR/17 Rev ID 0 (Back Elevation Proposal), 75RR/18 Rev ID 0 (Loft CM Calculation), 75RR/19 Rev ID 0 (Cross Section A-A) and 75RR/20 Rev ID 0 (Location and Site Plan).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The hereby approved side-facing window to the first-floor east elevation shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
